Articles.Content:
I made this:

Pay around with it, enjoy. it has 200 units of monoprop, 3 jet engines, and 2 aerospikes.

obligatory craft file: https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B_BVD9gAcd6BYXlYUUNqWmRURXc/

Here is the problem. I have no idea what it can really do because I suck at ascent profiles. I can get it up to 24km at 1350m/s and then go rocket, but I burn lie 80% of the fuel on board to do it. I feel like that's a lot given the capacity. So play around with it and let me know what the best ascent profile is once you go rocket.

EDIT: action groups:

1) toggle intakes and jets

2) toggle aerospikes

3) toggle capsule torque
